mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME(MEMSEQ, NAME, USERNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, INTRODUCE, WDATE, STATUS, MAINRESUME, DEL) VALUES (#{memSeq}, #{name}, #{userName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{introduce}, SYSDATE(), #{status}, 0, 0)
INSERT INTO CAREER(RSMSEQ, COMPANY, POSITION, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, ING) VALUES (#{rsmseq}, #{company}, #{position}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{ing})
INSERT INTO EDUCATION(RSMSEQ, SCHOOL, MAJOR, STUDY, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, ING) VALUES (#{rsmseq}, #{school}, #{major}, #{study}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{ing})
INSERT INTO AWARDSETC(RSMSEQ, AWARDS, DETAIL, DATE) VALUES (#{rsmseq}, #{awards}, #{detail}, #{date})
INSERT INTO LANGUAGE(RSMSEQ, LANG, LEVEL, TEST, SCORE, DATE) VALUES (#{rsmseq}, #{lang}, #{level}, #{test}, #{score}, #{date})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM RESUME WHERE MEMSEQ=#{memSeq} AND DEL=0
SELECT SEQ, MEMSEQ, NAME, WDATE, STATUS, MAINRESUME, DEL FROM ( SELECT * FROM RESUME WHERE DEL=0 ORDER BY SEQ DESC ) R WHERE 1=1 LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{start}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESUME SET MAINRESUME=0 WHERE MEMSEQ=#{memSeq} AND DEL=0
UPDATE RESUME SET MAINRESUME=1 WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND DEL=0
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, MEMSEQ, NAME, USERNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, INTRODUCE, WDATE, STATUS, MAINRESUME, DEL FROM RESUME WHERE SEQ=#{seq} AND MEMSEQ=#{memSeq} AND DEL=0
